title: Caitlyns Nemisis; New champion

replies.body:
Isnt {{champion:222}}  Caitlyns nemesis?
Yesterday I was playing Cait against a Jinx and had a passive I havent seen before in lane, which read something like "Jinx is causing chaos again. How obnoxious... Criminals Apprehended: xx"
C for cho'gath, the ultimate burglar

Inb4 Caitlyn was a dirty cop. It was her putting the "C" everywhere. They hired a cop to catch a criminal the was actually the cop they hired.
Incoming Caitlyn rework where she has Disassociative Personality Disorder (Multiple Personalities), one good cop, and one bad cop.
